mapper.select: SELECT msg2.msg_sq msg_sq, msg2.read_dt read_dt, msg2.snd_dt snd_dt, msg2.send_emp_name emp_name, msg2.msg_title msg_title, msg2.msg_content msg_content, msg2.read_count read_count, msg2.msg_fl_nm msg_fl_nm, msg2.msg_fl_path msg_fl_path, msg2.msg_type msg_type FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn , msg.* FROM ( SELECT mr.msg_sq, mr.read_dt, mg.snd_dt, e1.emp_name send_emp_name, e2.emp_name recv_emp_name, mg.msg_type, mg.msg_title, mg.msg_content, mr.read_count, mg.msg_fl_nm, mg.msg_fl_path FROM msg_rcv mr, msg mg, emp e1, emp e2 WHERE mr.emp_num = #{emp_num} AND mg.msg_sq = mr.msg_sq AND mg.emp_num = e1.emp_num AND mr.emp_num = e2.emp_num AND mg.msg_type = 0 ORDER BY msg_sq desc ) msg ) msg2 WHERE msg2.rn >= #{start} AND msg2.rn <= #{end}

SELECT msg2.msg_sq msg_sq, msg2.read_dt read_dt, msg2.snd_dt snd_dt, msg2.recv_emp_name recv_emp_name, msg2.msg_title msg_title, msg2.msg_content msg_content, msg2.read_count read_count, msg2.msg_fl_nm msg_fl_nm, msg2.msg_fl_path msg_fl_path FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn , msg.* FROM ( SELECT mr.msg_sq, mr.read_dt, mg.snd_dt, e1.emp_name send_emp_name, e2.emp_name recv_emp_name, mg.msg_title, mg.msg_content, mr.read_count, mg.msg_fl_nm, mg.msg_fl_path FROM msg_rcv mr, msg mg, emp e1, emp e2 where mg.emp_num = #{emp_num} and mg.msg_sq = mr.msg_sq and mg.emp_num = e1.emp_num and mr.emp_num = e2.emp_num ORDER BY msg_sq desc ) msg ) msg2 WHERE msg2.rn >= #{start} AND msg2.rn <= #{end}

select mg.msg_sq, mr.read_dt, mg.snd_dt, e.emp_name emp_name, mg.msg_title, mg.msg_content, mg.msg_fl_nm, mg.msg_fl_path from msg_rcv mr, msg mg, emp e where mg.msg_sq = #{msg_sq} and mg.msg_sq = mr.msg_sq and mg.emp_num = e.emp_num

select mg.msg_sq, mr.read_dt, mg.snd_dt, e.emp_name emp_name, mg.msg_title, mg.msg_content, read_count, mg.msg_fl_nm, mg.msg_fl_path from msg_rcv mr, msg mg, emp e where mg.msg_sq = #{msg_sq} and mg.msg_sq = mr.msg_sq and mr.emp_num = e.emp_num
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM msg_rcv mr, msg mg, emp e1, emp e2 where mg.emp_num = #{emp_num} and mg.msg_sq = mr.msg_sq and mg.emp_num = e1.emp_num and mr.emp_num = e2.emp_num
SELECT count(*) FROM msg_rcv mr, msg mg, emp e1, emp e2 WHERE mr.emp_num = #{emp_num} AND mg.msg_sq = mr.msg_sq AND mg.emp_num = e1.emp_num AND mr.emp_num = e2.emp_num AND mg.msg_type = 0
mapper.insert: insert into msg(msg_SQ, EMP_NUM, msg_title, msg_content, SND_DT, msg_FL_NM, msg_FL_PATH, msg_type) values (msg_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{emp_num}, #{msg_title}, #{msg_content}, sysdate, #{msg_fl_nm}, #{msg_fl_path}, 0)
insert into msg_rcv(msg_SQ, EMP_NUM, READ_COUNT) values (MSG_SQ.CURRVAL, #{emp_num2}, 0)
mapper.update: update msg set msg_type = '1' where msg_sq = #{checks[i]}
update msg_rcv set read_count = 1, read_dt = sysdate where msg_sq = (select mg.msg_sq from msg_rcv mr, msg mg, emp e where mg.msg_sq = #{msg_sq} and mg.msg_sq = mr.msg_sq and mg.emp_num = e.emp_num)
